item.title: Rubrik rotates authentication keys after log server breach
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Rubrik disclosed last month that one of its servers hosting log files was breached, causing the company to rotate potentially leaked authentication keys. [...]

item.title: DHS says CISA will not stop monitoring Russian cyber threats
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: The US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency says that media reports about it being directed to no longer follow or report on Russian cyber activity are untrue, and its mission remains unchanged. [...]

item.title: New Microsoft 365 outage impacts Teams, causes call failures
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is investigating a new Microsoft 365 outage that is affecting Teams customers and causing call failures. [...]

item.title: CISA tags Windows, Cisco vulnerabilities as actively exploited
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: CISA has warned US federal agencies to secure their systems against attacks exploiting vulnerabilities in Cisco and Windows systems. [...]

item.title: New ClickFix attack deploys Havoc C2 via Microsoft Sharepoint
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: A newly uncovered ClickFix phishing campaign is tricking victims into executing malicious PowerShell commands that deploy the Havok post-exploitation framework for remote access to compromised devices. [...]

item.title: UK watchdog probes TikTok and Reddit over child privacy concerns
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: On Monday, the United Kingdom's privacy watchdog announced that it is investigating TikTok, Reddit, and Imgur because of privacy concerns about how they are processing children's data. [...]

item.title: Microsoft links recent Microsoft 365 outage to buggy update
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft says a coding issue is behind a now-resolved Microsoft 365 outage over the weekend that affected Outlook and Exchange Online authentication. [...]

item.title: Nearly 12,000 API keys and passwords found in AI training dataset
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: Close to 12,000 valid secrets that include API keys and passwords have been found in the Common Crawl dataset used for training multiple artificial intelligence models. [...]

item.title: Ransomware gangs exploit Paragon Partition Manager bug in BYOVD attacks
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Microsoft had discovered five Paragon Partition Manager BioNTdrv.sys driver flaws, with one used by ransomware gangs in zero-day attacks to gain SYSTEM privileges in Windows. [...]

item.title: U.S. recovers $31 million stolen in 2021 Uranium Finance hack
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: U.S. authorities recovered $31 million in cryptocurrency stolen in 2021 cyberattacks on Uranium Finance, a Binance Smart Chain-based DeFi protocol. [...]

item.title: Qilin ransomware claims attack at Lee Enterprises, leaks stolen data
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Qilin ransomware gang has claimed responsibility for the attack at Lee Enterprises that disrupted operations on February 3, leaking samples of data they claim was stolen from the company. [...]

item.title: Police arrests suspects tied to AI-generated CSAM distribution ring
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Law enforcement agencies from 19 countries have arrested 25 suspects linked to a criminal ring that was distributing child sexual abuse material (CSAM) generated using artificial intelligence (AI). [...]
